website_summaries.verdict: High-tier technologies make the Asics Gel Kayano 21 a solid option for those who want to run in a comfortable and efficient way. Stability and support are given to the wearer because it has systems that balance out the running gait. Fluid motion on the roads are given in droves by this shoe.
pros: The FluidFit® upper makes use of multi-directional stretch mesh and reinforcements to provide a glove-like coverage
An exoskeletal heel counter keeps the rear of the foot in place, preventing accidental shoe removal
The shock absorbing nature of the gel-like unit in the mid-sole was appreciated by many runners
Over-pronated foot motion is staved off because of mid-foot stability mechanisms
Durable rubber technologies make the outsole of the Asics Gel Kayano 21 formidable against wear and tear
The sock liner gives additional underfoot cushioning while also bringing moisture management
cons: The Asics Gel Kayano 21 has an expensive price
A few runners noted that the interior lining tore apart after a few months

customer_reviews.title: Same size as current Kayano gel trainers, but smaller
customer_reviews.text: Shame. I ordered the same size as my current Kayano gel trainers which were comfortable from the first wear. These are too tight and my toe hits the top of the cloth inside the shoe. Had to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Blair the camel

customer_reviews.title: Great for mitigating injury.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for mum. The Asics shoes are some of the only ones that I wear and have encouraged others in my family to do so. People with knee injuries etc really benefit from the gel cushioning and support in the Kayanos. Amazing shoes.
customer_reviews.author: DrTim

customer_reviews.title: They made me go faster!
customer_reviews.text: The first time I wore these out I took 10 minutes off my 18k distance. They must have a turbo setting I didn't know about. :-) Have had the same model before which is why I was comfortable purchasing these online.
customer_reviews.author: Lozzie

customer_reviews.title: Good fit
customer_reviews.text: Although the some other reviews were saying that they fit to small, mu opionion is that the sizing is normal! They dont feel shotrt or narrow (and i have wide feet). I ordered 5.5(half size more than i usual order)...and i returned then as they were to long . Also i will wait for a price cut for kayano 22 as i didnt like thw quality of this ones.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Supportive and comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I love these asics trainers, this is my second pair they are so supportive and comfortable. I purchased the first pair in June 2015 and have worn they for every run since without problem (on average 3 times a week). Now beginning to up my training so time to wear the second pair. I normally wear a size 6 1/2 shoe but always choose to wear a whole size bigger (7 1/2) in running trainers.
customer_reviews.author: Olly's mum

customer_reviews.title: I love these trainers so much
customer_reviews.text: I love these trainers so much. I forgot to review on purchase but about a year or so down the line, they have seen me through rain and shine, many many miles a couple of races and now I want to buy the exact pair again. No faults, great product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product and looks fab.
customer_reviews.text: I saw these and fell in love with the colour immediately. As someone who has experienced a far share of sports injuries, I need the support that the Gel-Kayano provides. These ones do not disappoint. As noted in some other reviews, they are small fitting, I order a size bigger than my last pair and they fit perfectly.!
customer_reviews.author: skm

customer_reviews.title: not just for perfecting running and that extra mile
customer_reviews.text: These were bought on the advice of a podiatrist, for their support. They were chosen also for the removable insole, deliberately one size too big to accommodate orthotics for gait correction. I was able to buy these as I had already bought a pair in a different colour from the Asics shop and had the benefit of advice and training - sorry Amazon - great price though
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: Excellent running shoes.
customer_reviews.text: Really excellent running shoes. Just remember to always get a 1/2 size bigger than your usual trainer. Or, if you are a serious runner - go to the shops to get your running style checked so that you buy the right running shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Nasim

customer_reviews.title: Superbly comfortable and supportive shoe
customer_reviews.text: Superbly comfortable and supportive shoe, although as I wear them all the time and not just as a running shoe, I wish Asics would produce more in more subtle colours! Asics shoes are always are a little small, but an extra 1/2 on your normal size usually makes for a good fit.

customer_reviews.title: Very fast delivery
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these on a Friday, they arrived on Sunday - two days earlier than expected! They were carefully packed, and the shoes themselves were exactly as expected. I've had these shoes before (the 20s, I think) so I just ordered the same size. For me, the sizing of Asics are accurate, I take the same size as in all other shoes.

product_meta.title: ASICS Gel-Kayano 21, Women's Running Shoes
product_meta.description: The shoe has assembled more than 20 years of success on the road, aiding the experience of a more stable run when racking up the miles. The Kayano 21 combines cushioning and impact resistance with equal aplomb. The GEL-KAYANO 21 stays true to its successful reputation between runners, improving upon its famous ride with technically advanced features, the new technologies employed will take your running to the next level. Upper Constructed with FluidFit technology, technical mesh combines with additional highly functioning materials permitting an extremely pliable upper, whilst generating a glove-like fit. Catering for the breathable element required by many runner, the mesh upper allows air to permeate the exterior, proving breathability within. Intelligently discrete eyelets disperse lace tension, creating personalized, comfortable environment, specifically designed for you. Midsole The midsole contains an amalgamation of technologies implemented to produce a more stable, cushioned ride. FluidRide, the latest evolution in ASICS midsole technology yields the ultimate in bounce back and cushioning characteristics while maintaining lightweight effectiveness. Supplementing the habitual lightweight feel accustomed to the Kayano, Solyte enhances cushioning and durability respectively. The raft of performance boosting technologies doesn't stop there, with SpEVA 55 Lasting incorporated in the midsole as a lasting technology for enhanced cushioning and comfort. Outsole The outsole compromises a new blown rubber outsole material utilized to further increase cushioning, durability and encourage a smoother ride. The sole placement in the outsole has been strategically arranged to ensure ultimate grip underfoot is granted to the wearer. Monitoring Your Run. The shoe has been specifically crafted to cater to the needs of the over-pronator. Technology sampled within the shoe has been a success and a more stable ride is a product of innovation. Dynamic Duomax provides greater
feature_bullets: FluidRide Midsole - Features a two-layer construction that blends luxurious lightweight cushioning and a responsive bouncy underfoot comfort.

FluidFit Upper Construction - Features 4-way stretch mesh and stretch reinforcements throughout the entire quarter panel on both medial and lateral sides, providing a personalized fit and improved breathability for unmatched upper comfort.
I.G.S - ASICS Design Philosophy employs linked components that enhances the foot's natural gait from heel strike to toe-off for improved running efficiency and an improved ride underfoot.
Full-length Guidance Line - Vertical flex groove decouples the tooling along the line of progression for enhanced gait efficiency.

Guidance Trusstic - This trusstic system integrates Guidance Line construction for enhanced gait efficiency while providing midfoot structural integrity for a more consistent and directional ride underfoot.
